author: Jim Chairusmi
title: A Green U.S. Hockey Team to Clash With Grizzled Russians
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—The U.S. men’s hockey team had just beaten Slovakia 2-1 on Friday when Jordan Greenway looked at a crowd of reporters and knew what question was coming next.
“Now the focus is on Russia,” said the 21-year-old forward from Boston University about the Americans’ next opponent—officially called Olympic Athletes from Russia—on Saturday night.
After...
